column3: is a city and headquarters of Muridke Tehsil of Sheikhupura District in Punjab
column4: Pakistan. It is the 53rd largest city of Pakistan by population. Muridke is situated near the city of Lahore
column5: at an elevation of 205 m (675 ft) and is situated on the Grand Trunk Road.

column2: Muridke became the headquarters of the newly created Muridke Tehsil of Sheikhupura District.

column1: Chand Bagh School is situated on the Muridke-Sheikhupura road.
